A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible instalment for Star Wars fans!
Bad character development\, including throw away characters (i.e. Holdo\, Snoke\, Tallie\, dj)
Terrible end for Admiral Ackbar.
Rose was a terrible character with no gravitas.
Rey has no clear character drive\, it teased her flirting with the dark side whilst with luke\, but has no further repercussions.
very disappointing that they killed luke off (yes I know he can return as a force ghost)\, but given that carrie fisher had passed away prior to the films release it would have made some sense to have kept luke alive\, possibly had rey staying with Kylo Ren in an attempt to soften him...

There was so much potential for this film\, but they just seem to have taken too much of a chance and ruined this for many of the older fans.
what is sadder is their lack of caring for this and a complete disregard for any constructive criticism!
